channel.title: I need help with HybridScape
channel.description:
How do I change the ::help command's text/message when using HybridScape? ---- Can HybridScape be coded in anyway... there's no client.java file... --- How do I make the dummy's give XP? (The ammount given as well) --- Can I add in more commands, and change what they do; if so, how?
Thanks, Unholy Angel

item.title: I need help with HybridScape
item.dc:creator: @Unholy_Angel Unholy Angel
item.description:
@Unholy_Angel wrote:

Yeah, I would… but I gotta download JDK with a dial-up connection and it’s 56MB. I’ll do it overnight, tonight while I sleep. Until then I’m playing around with HybridScape…

Thanks.

Read full topic

item.title: I need help with HybridScape
item.dc:creator: @Zaron Zaron
item.description:
@Zaron wrote:

Hybridscape can not be editted, its just a crappy version of rs with nothing to do, i would use a server, not hybridscape!

Read full topic
